content.query:
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE NYCTrip.employee (
	[empid] bigint,
	[empName] nvarchar(4000),
	[salary] bigint,
	[dept] nvarchar(4000)
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'Data/employee.csv',
	DATA_SOURCE = myDataSourceManagedABFSS,
	FILE_FORMAT = delimitedFileFormat
	)
GO


SELECT TOP 100 * FROM NYCTrip.employee
GO
